You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5 rows by 5 columns. The top row has an X in the first and last columns, and empty squares in the middle three columns. The second row has an X in the first, second, and last columns, and empty squares in the middle two columns. The third row has an X in the first, third, and last columns, and empty squares in the second and fourth columns. The fourth row has an X in the first, fourth, and fifth columns, and empty squares in the second and third columns. The fifth row has an X in the first and last columns, and empty squares in the middle three columns.
